column4: i know this is not an ubuntu questoin..but does anyone how to edit what starts at boot up on fedora?
i need to stop exim from starting and get postfix to start
its a server so there is no gui
chkconfig, and service
kinda? :)
yeah thats whay i thought
what*
but i was getting errrors trying to run postfix untill i stoped exim
cuz exim had the lock on the port
service exim stop; service postfix start
meff:yes i know that...i just dont want to have to do that everytime i reboot the server
ahh, man chkconfig
that works but its not the right way ;)
lol...ok ill check out that stuff... thanks
just use chkconfig and disable it on every runlevel
yeah...just reading the man page now...thanks
bah Nonphasis i do all the init ln'ing by hand :)
really? hah
i've never read a linux book
im au naturale or something :P
oh your one of those who just 'read' it
hehe
thanks again..worked like a charm
cool np
